I wasn't expecting for it to be this good, this game is great! The story is really well done , and the gameplay is on point. But the things I've done in this game...
This game has the best graphics ever I've ever seen.
No More Room in Hell has one of my favourite soundtracks!

Dayz standalone is a great game,  you can't find the experience anywhere else. It has bugs but there is no game breaking bugs. You won't broke your leg going into a building :) anymore. BTW once you buy the alpha you will get the whole game and all the updates. So $30.00 is pretty good.+Great map and many improvements+Great Feel+Lots of improvement over the dayz mod-bugs-feels kind of clunky going through buildingsDont forget this is an alpha.One time i ate a rotten kiwi because i was really hungry and about a hour later i was armed to the teeth with the best gear. I was about to die from the kiwi and then a guy shot me :( But remember don't trust anyone at all.....
